backend/main.mo: Primary backend actor defining authorization mixins, storage, various data types, and mutable state maps for users, appointments, products, orders, media, and publications.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module mapping old actor state to the new structure, defining legacy types and returning the original state without modification.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a training document PDF-link fix to the relevant frontend file and components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON mapping of frontend file paths to descriptive summaries of their UI roles and behavior.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app via root div and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, payment status routing, layout structure, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/Biography.tsx: Biography section component fetching biography content and rendering an animated parallax visual layout with portrait and styled text.
frontend/src/components/Booking.tsx: Renders the booking section with consulting rate info, membership-gated access, and login or membership navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/CartDrawer.tsx: Implements a slide-out shopping cart with item display, total calculation, and Stripe checkout session creation.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact information fetched from the backend including phone, email, and location.
frontend/src/components/Credentials.tsx: Shows credential-related images such as diplomas and a portrait with styled presentation.
frontend/src/components/DnsStatusChecker: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Provides footer content with professional credentials list and a copyright notice.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Defines the main site header with navigation links, scroll behavior, and Internet Identity login/logout handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with layered parallax backgrounds reacting to mouse movement and a smooth scroll helper.
frontend/src/components/Media.tsx: Media section showing training videos with access control, authentication checks, and parallax effects.
frontend/src/components/Membership.tsx: Displays membership plans, user membership status, and subscription flow with PayPal redirect.
frontend/src/components/PaymentFailure.t: Full‑screen payment failure message with navigation options back to home or membership retry.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccess.t: Full‑screen payment success message that refreshes membership data and offers navigation links.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for collecting and saving a user’s basic profile information with validation and API submission.
frontend/src/components/Publications.tsx: Renders a publications section that fetches books, displays purchase links, and includes a PayPal payment portal.
frontend/src/components/Store.tsx: Displays a list of hardcoded apparel items with order links and QR codes in a styled merchandise section.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Provides an admin‑only modal for entering and saving Stripe secret key and allowed countries via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/SupportDonations: Shows donation options with styled Venmo and Cash App cards including QR codes and links.
frontend/src/components/TrainingVideos.t: Fetches and displays training videos and documents, offering external watch/download links and a PayPal section.
frontend/src/components/VideoModal.tsx: File is empty or contains no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, content, access checks, and various backend resources via the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up global Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and custom utility classes for glow, shadows, and visual effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/staticAssetUrl.ts: Builds safe URL-encoded paths for static assets under /assets/, handling special characters and absolute URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both querystring and hash routing with sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, containers, shadows, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, including tasks to fix Training Document #3 PDF linking and remove a leading space in the INTRO paragraph.
